TopicTitle: Any Working Versions of the Kethane Mod.. or Should I Just Wait?

Articles.Content: I got the Kethane mod along with a patch to make it work in the newest version, however it breaks my game and the launchpad wont load properly. I was wondering if anyone knows of a patch that works for them I could try, OR if I should wait. From what I hear in .21 there will be resource mining but I'm not sure if it's confirmed or not.

I officially updated Kethane for KSP 0.20 compatibility about two weeks ago. Since then I've released four other updates, two of them substantial. You should only download Kethane from the thread here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/23979-Kethane
